pref_key_app_information App Information
pref_appVersion_key Wetfish Version
pref_appVersionSummary_key Version Summary
Gallery Activity\n - Card View Spacing now takes more space \n\n
Gallery Collection Activity\n - Fix crashing when various files aren\'t present while moving through items\n - PNG pictures of appropriate file states\n - File clicking will now redirect the user to Wetfish if not on the file system\n - File clicking will now appropriately open up the correct image\n\n
Upload Page\n - An alert dialog will now pop up when moving back screens\n - Video Uploading now has one tab\n - View alignment fixed\n - Loading Tab on devices greater than v24\n\n
Misc.\n - Fix for crashes on bitmap rescaling\n
Click here for Wetfish version details Okay
